Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam’s Pakistan will take on a depleted Proteas in a four-match T20I series.
Pakistan will aim to use these deficiencies to their advantage and get a lead in the series.
The Proteas have lost quite a few of their players due to various reasons – few are out with injuries, whereas five others are in India to play in the IPL 2021.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 1st T20I between the two sides will be played at the Wanderers Stadium in Johannesburg on Saturday, April 10, from 6:00 PM, IST.
All matches of the South Africa vs Pakistan 2021 series will be telecasted live on Star Sports network, live stream on the Disney+ Hotstar app and Jio TV.
The visitors won the ODI series and would be pretty much high on confidence, while the same can’t be said about the hosts.
